channel.title: ğŸŠ cyhwang blog
channel.description: Recent content on ğŸŠ cyhwang blog

item.title: First Post
item.description: This is my first post after making the blog. Here is how I built this blog. I used the Gokarna theme from Hugo themes. Using hugo I followed the instructions from here. hugo new site <project_name> cd <project_name> Adding the theme I used github pages for hosting the Webpage. To separate the whole source code and the built code in different repositories, I first deleted the public directory. rmdir public git init git submodule add https://github.
